name: @tiddlybase/wiki-builder
description: In-browser trusted code running outside the sandbox
author: Peter Neumark

scripts.build: node index.js > tiddlywiki.info && yarn workspace @tiddlybase/root run move_sourcemaps && TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=../../dist/plugins tiddlywiki . --output ../../dist/tiddlybase_public --build wiki.html --verbose
scripts.build:json: node json-builder.js > tiddlywiki.info && yarn workspace @tiddlybase/root run move_sourcemaps && TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=../../dist/plugins yarn tiddlywiki . --output ../../dist/ --build wiki.json --verbose
scripts.build:debug: node index.js > tiddlywiki.info && NODE_OPTIONS=--inspect-brk TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=../../dist/plugins tiddlywiki . --output ../../dist --build wiki.html --verbose
